LanguageData.VPE_EltexMeteor.questDescriptionRules.ru: questDescription->A large meteorite has struck ground nearby. It has left behind a lump of arcanium. Arcanium can be used to create magically-enhancing gear, or sold to the Empire to gain honor.\n\nYou can send a mining party to retrieve it, but chances are if you wait long enough, someone else will lay claim to it.
LanguageData.VPE_EltexMeteor.root.nodes.WorldObjectTi: Others have mined the Arcanium meteor. The quest [resolvedQuestName] has expired.
